channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.7.5
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 12.19 with PostGIS 3.0.11
  • PostgreSQL 13.15 with PostGIS 3.1.11
  • PostgreSQL 14.12 with PostGIS 3.2.7
  • PostgreSQL 15.7 with PostGIS 3.3.6
  • PostgreSQL 16.3 with PostGIS 3.4.2
  • PostgreSQL 17beta2 without PostGIS

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
